Growth Type Chart
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS: FAQ (basic essentials, read this first!): Growth Type Chart
By Thorr on Monday, February 11, 2008 - 08:55 am:

Here is the Growth Type Chart for use with Breed/Monster Guide section of this FAQ area. The listed monsters will have Growth Type listed in their Profile. Use this chart to see the appropriate stat gain pattern for that Growth Type.

Growth Type Chart

In the interest of saving bandwidth, I highly recommend you save a copy of this image for yourself.
